title: How is the delivering from google store works exactly ?
content: Hi there i have a question but im not sure who i should ask so im gonna start here. So im traveling to dublin in few days and i want to buy pixel 3a but the thing is im gonna be in Dublin every other day since i want to see countryside as well. So my question is if there is a way i could agree with delivery man where and when i could meet with him since the delivery period on webside is two days.
